sentences.sContent: We always eat turkey on Thanksgiving.
sentences.sCn: 我们过感恩节时总是吃火鸡。

sentences.sContent: Are you going home for Thanksgiving?
...which is similar to the custom of celebrating Thanksgiving in North America...

remMethod.val: thanks(感谢) ＋ giving(给予) → 感谢上帝的给予 → 感恩节

trans.tranOther: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc
